page.title: 13HOUSING (East Block)
page.content: In sqs.9471,9571,9470 and 9570 the land is agricultural and the only houses we found were{farm houses}which were detached and surrounded by barns. In sq. 9469 there is a mixture of {council and private houses}which are all built of brick and are separated by Hartsholme Park. The{private houses are still being built and cost between Â£45000 and Â£70000. They are all detached, have double garages and some of them back onto the lake. The council houses are{semi-detached, {terraced or flats.}They are about 30 years old and all have gardens but not many had a garage because cars were not so popular when they were built. The{flats}were built of brick, 4 stories high and had grassed areas around them. The other block of flats had 16 floors, were made of concrete and brick and are about 15 years old.
